name: Laleh Azar
title: Director of Cultural Experience Design
responsibility: Laleh leads the development of immersive, culturally respectful travel itineraries that highlight local heritage, art, and tradition.

name: Meilin Zhang
title: Head of Client Experience and Operations
responsibility: Meilin ensures that every client interaction — from first inquiry to final feedback — is seamless, personalized, and infused with warmth and care.

name: Achieng Njeri
title: Global Partnerships and Community Engagement Lead
responsibility: Achieng builds meaningful partnerships with local communities and ethical travel providers to ensure mutual benefit and authentic engagement.

name: Elin Dahlgren
title: Chief Strategy and Sustainability Officer
responsibility: Elin guides the company’s long-term growth strategy while championing environmental responsibility and inclusive travel practices.
